{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Nortel |model=WLAN Access Point 2330 |revision= |upc=056097035494 |ean= |asin=B000BREMF6 |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/28/2005 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha Networks |manuf_model=WAP-D25 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=RVW2330 |ic_id=332R-2330 |us_id= |pwr_v=48 |pwr_amp=0.4 |pwr_conn=Ethernet (PoE) |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR5312A;AR5312A-00, GG8634.1B, 0530, TAIWAN; |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 MiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV160BTTC-70G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 MiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT48LC4M32B2-7 G |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (38400,8,N,1),, JP2,, Alpha type1 pinout |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5312A;AR5312A-00, GG8634.1B, 0530, TAIWAN; |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR5112A;AR5112A-00, CR2321.00E, 0534, CHINA; |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=a |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR5312A;AR5312A-00, GG8634.1B, 0530, TAIWAN; |wi2_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip2_model=AR2112A;AR2112A-00, CR4260.00C, 0536, KOREA; |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=IC+ |eth_chip2_model=IP101A |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Microsemi;LX5510;1; ,,, 4.5 to 6GHz Power Amplifier IC;Microsemi;LX5506;;1; |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:15:E8 |oui_eth=00:15:E8 }} {{TagLine|Dual mode 2.4GHz / 5GHz Access Point}} "8WAPD25..1A1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :It seems to be identical to the [[Enterasys RBT-1602]] (under the '''Trapeze Networks''' grantee code). "8WAPD25..3A1" is silkscreened on a production model board (8-layer). ==Serial== ===Pinout=== 
JP2
(TxD) (GND) (3.3)       [RxD]
===Output=== 


    Trapeze Networks AP Bootstrap 1.5 (01/xx/05)


GO 1 entry_addr 80400000 ....

AP Boot Loader version 16
Stage 1 boot code build 4.0.7.5_080805_0731__AP
access point startup
With keypresses following, an 
ap_mon:
shell is displayed. No commands are known and nothing obvious seems to be accepted. JTAG access will likely be necessary to do anything useful..
